summary: A Collection of 72 Skyrim Wallpaper - all in 1920x1080 Resolution
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone !

This is a Compilation of my best Wallpapers from Skyrim. The Resolution is 1920x1080.

NEW !!!

- Now you got Preview Pictures aswell as a Preview Video for making sure that you will like the 72 WP in this 235 MB Download.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm going to edit a new Version of Wallpapers, not including any Filters at all during this Week.

They will be different from the existing edited ones you got here.

Then I will upload a new File where everyone can choose the Wallpaper Package he/she prefers.

Along with this I will give the full List of Mods I installed during the Screenshot Sessions.

So everyone is able to achieve the same Skyrim - Look my Wallpapers got.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For Future Wallpapers please check out my Gallery on DA http://ezekielepharcelis.deviantart.com/gallery/

cya

[img]http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/3876/schwarzweitecartoon.png[/img]
By [url=http://profile.imageshack.us/user/ezekielephar]ezekielephar[/url] at 2012-01-14
author: Epharcelis
